attributes.action: New referendum for Brexit with ''knowledge of the true terms of Brexit"
attributes.additional_details:
State pension age possible to raise to 74 years due to employment crisis
Council tax to raise
Electricity and gas to raise
VAT flat rate scheme increased from to 16.5%
Food price to raise
Big investors to leave UK - lack of jobs
Increase of unemployment
attributes.background:
All the cost of Brexit needs to be exposed to show the decision was based on imperfect knowledge.
New Referendum needed now that people are more informed
